name: Yeti, Set, Go!
description:
Join our Yeti in an epic adventure as his loved ones are kidnapped by evil scientists!

Use your unique ability to control time to pursue the bad guys in this action-packed snowboard game. Pick up your board, take control of the yeti to perform insane tricks and play awesome challenges with your friends.

Earn coins and upgrade your gear to become the master of the mountains in this mobile game now available for iOS!

FEATURES:
• Free to play!
• Fun and challenging single player campaign
• Exciting asynchronous multiplayer
• Manipulate time and rewind the game
• Level editor: Build your own levels
• Complete missions to earn coins and upgrade your rank
• Upgrade your gear and protection
• Unlock Achievements, and more!
